item.title: Pete Hegseth’s ‘Kill Everybody’ Command
item.description: The secretary of war’s alleged order that led to drug boat–strike survivors’ being killed appears to be a violation of the norms of warfare.

item.title: Gavin Newsom’s Achilles’ Heel
item.description: The governor is one of the top 2028 Democratic contenders, but Scott Wiener’s radical record leaves Newsom vulnerable to attack.

item.title: Military Lawfare Is a Red Line
item.description: Incorporating the Pentagon into the campaign against political enemies — even those who make a craven video — raises the abuse of executive power to a...

item.title: How Europe Fell Behind
item.description: Brussels regulated first and asked questions never, among other reasons.

item.title: The National Guard Shooting Tragedy
item.description: Another gut-wrenching day for the country.
